statements: SELECT * FROM wine_club_members ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM wine_club_members WHERE membership_level='Gold';
SELECT * FROM wine_club_members WHERE favorite_wine IS NOT NULL;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, membership_level, favorite_wine FROM wine_club_members ORDER BY member_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, wine_preference FROM wine_club_members WHERE wine_preference LIKE '%red%';
SELECT * FROM wine_club_members ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM wine_club_members WHERE membership_level = 'Gold' OR membership_level = 'Platinum';
SELECT member_id, first_name, wine_preference FROM wine_club_members WHERE favorite_wine LIKE '%Chardonnay%' ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM wine_club_members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, membership_level, favorite_wine FROM wine_club_members WHERE favorite_wine IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members;
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE wine_type = 'Red' ORDER BY vintage_year DESC;
SELECT member_id, wine_type, region FROM preferences WHERE region LIKE 'Italy%' ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE member_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE wine_type = 'Red' AND region = 'Bordeaux';
SELECT first_name, email, phone_number FROM members WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE vintage_year > 2010 ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM members JOIN preferences ON members.member_id = preferences.member_id;
SELECT * FROM wine_club_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM wine_club_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM wine_preferences WHERE preferred_region = 'France';
SELECT member_name, membership_start_date FROM wine_club_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT event_theme, event_location FROM tasting_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wine_club_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM wine_club_members WHERE membership_start_date <= '2022-09-15';
SELECT member_name, wine_type, preferred_region FROM wine_club_members JOIN wine_preferences ON wine_club_members.member_id = wine_preferences.member_id WHERE preferred_region = 'France';
SELECT event_theme, event_date, event_location FROM tasting_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT member_name, preferred_grape_type FROM wine_club_members JOIN wine_preferences ON wine_club_members.member_id = wine_preferences.member_id WHERE wine_type = 'Red' AND preferred_grape_type = 'Merlot';
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM club_events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT member_id, event_id, RSVP_status FROM member_events WHERE RSVP_status = 'Attending' ORDER BY member_id, event_id;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM club_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT m.first_name, m.last_name, e.event_name FROM members m JOIN member_events me ON m.member_id = me.member_id JOIN club_events e ON me.event_id = e.event_id WHERE me.RSVP_status = 'Attending';
SELECT p.wine_type, p.region, p.vintage, m.first_name, m.last_name FROM preferences p JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.price_range = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT wine_type, region FROM preferences ORDER BY vintage_year DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM members WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM members WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE member_id = 3 ORDER BY vintage_year DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
